title.rendered: Experiences: Using Handshake to Manage a High Impact Educational Practice—2020

content.rendered:
This webinar was part of the 2020 Handshake Access Summer Series

Panelists include experts from Kennesaw State University — Lori Trahan, Associate Director of Career Services, and Krysta Fry, Assistant Director of Career Services.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: A panel discussion on how to use Handshake to manage a high impact experiential learning program.
